TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpResponseMessageProperty extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty
Public NotInheritable Class HttpResponseMessageProperty Implements IMessageProperty

summary.span: 提供对 HTTP 响应的访问，以便访问和响应为 HTTP 协议请求提供的附加信息。

span.span: Provides access to the HTTP response in order to access and respond to the additional information made available for requests over the HTTP protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个通用类，可用来直接访问 HTTP 响应信息，该类可用于 HTTP 特定信息的包装。This is a general-purpose class that gives you direct access to the HTTP response information, which could be used for encapsulation of HTTP-specific information. 此类的一个作用是对根据“具象状态传输”(REST) 体系结构实现的服务提供支持。One use of this class is to support services implemented in accordance with the Representational State Transfer (REST) architecture. 此类可以支持下列方案：This class enables you to support the following scenarios: - 控制是否传输实体正文。Controls whether an entity body is transmitted. - 允许对每个响应设置 HTTP 标头 (key, value) 对。Allows HTTP header (key, value) pairs to be set for each response. - 对每个响应都使用不同的状态代码和状态说明。Varies the status code and status description used for each response. 此类可由 和相关类使用。This class can be used by and related classes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用它来创建 `HttpResponseProperty` 类的实例并修改其部分成员：This shows how to use create an instance of the `HttpResponseProperty` class and modify some of its members: [!code-csharp[S_UEHttpResponseMessageProperty#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uehttpresponsemessageproperty/cs/service.cs#0)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否忽略消息正文，只发送一个空消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the body of the message is ignored and an empty message is sent.

value.span: 如果禁止发送消息正文，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the message body is suppressed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于空消息响应，例如，一个服务接受 POST 请求并返回不包含任何消息正文的响应，其中 StatusCode = 200，StatusDescription = OK。This property is used for empty message responses, for example, a service that accepts a POST request and returns a response that contains no message body with StatusCode = 200 and StatusDescription = OK. 与此响应关联的 将此属性设置为 `true`。The associated with this response has this property set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何禁止发送消息正文：This shows how to suppress the message body: [!code-csharp[S_UEHttpResponseMessageProperty#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uehttpresponsemessageproperty/cs/service.cs#5)]
